meanings.definition: Move in a circular orbit around a central point.
meanings.sent1: The Earth revolves around the sun.
meanings.sent2: The planets in our solar system revolve around the sun.
meanings.sent3: The merry-go-round revolves slowly, making everyone dizzy.
meanings.sent4: Her life revolves around her passion for painting.
meanings.sent5: The moon revolves gracefully in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Cause to move in a circular orbit around a central point.
meanings.sent1: The gravitational pull of the sun revolves the planets.
meanings.sent2: The teacher revolves the globe to show different countries.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child revolves the chair, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His charisma revolves people around him like a magnet.
meanings.sent5: The windmill revolves with the force of the wind.
